allow: Bash(then echo "[COMPLETE] Training finished - final_weights.json found")
Bash(else echo "[NOT FOUND] No training artifacts found")
Bash(then echo "[COMPLETE] Training finished - gen2_weights.json found")
Bash(else echo "[STARTING] Waiting for training to start...")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Reorganize AI training artifacts and documentation

Restructured project to organize AI models, training data, and documentation:

- Created ai_training/ directory structure
  - ai_training/bc/ contains production BC model (Hard-level performance)
  - ai_training/archive/gen0/ archives first supervised learning attempt
  - Added comprehensive README documenting models and methodology

- Moved all design documents from designs/ to docs/
- Moved training result docs (FINAL_TRAINING_RESULTS.md, TRAINING_RESULTS.md) to docs/

- Deleted failed Gen2 self-play RL artifacts (gen2_weights.json)
- Deleted old experimental files (trained_weights.json, train_pipeline.bat, win32 dumps)

- Updated .gitignore to exclude Python artifacts and large training data files

Production BC model (bc_hard_20ep_10k.json) achieves ~Hard difficulty level:
- 93.94% training accuracy (20 epochs, 10k games, 15 min training)
- ~31.8% win rate vs Hard (comparable performance)
- Significantly outperforms Gen0 (+62% more wins)
